rules_text:
Aspire is all colors.
Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of colors among permanents you control.
flavor_text:
[i]“Success comes easier when you try.”
—Xio, Performance Judge[/i]
rules_text2:
Legacy [i](You may play this side of this card only from your graveyard. Exile it if it would be put into a graveyard or not resolve.)[/i]
Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Untap it. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
